modName: TARGARYEN CONQUEST OF SKYRIM (IMPERIAL ARMOR REPLACER)
summary: REPLACE ALL IMPERIAL ARMORS WITH MY TARGARYEN CUIRASS, MALE ONLY..(for now) ENJOY!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#85200C][size=6]TARGARYEN CONQUEST OF SKYRIM
[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=4]

Simply Replace the imperial armors with my targaryen cuirass
and the imperial swords with a new dragon steel sword; IF YOU ALREADY HAVE MY TARGARYEN ARMOR
INSTALLED..SIMPLY OVERWRITE THE OLD ESP WITH THE NEW ONE AND PLAY!..
[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=4]
I HAVE MADE A NEW BANNER RETEXTURE ...IMPERIAL TO TARGARYEN...
[color=#f4f4f4]Download under OPTIONAL section
[/color][/size][/color][size=4]
[color=#93c47d][size=5]
_Credits_

[size=4]Dragon Steel Weapons by [b]jet4571[/b][/size] [size=4]here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85181/?
[/size]

[/size][/color]
